price: និងក្ដីមេត្ដាករុណា ហើយនិងភាពស្អាតសំ្អអំពីយើង ហើយ គេគឺជាអ្នកកោតខ្លាច(ចំពោះអល់ឡោះ)។
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
